channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 02/22/2024 # New Features # Support for Google education account invitations: if you are using a Google Education account, please invite meet@seasalt.ai to your calendar invite to use SeaMeet Reduced workspace creation time Plan change notification Notification for plan upgrade options on browser extension SeaMeet Copilot can directly join if meet@seaslt.ai is invited as an attendee on Google Calendar Bugfix # Improve app latency caused by payment plan restriction Paid plan banner will only appear in the free plan 02/01/2024 # New Feature # Released paid plan features 01/25/2024 # New Feature # Login: A brand new Sign-In option!
